src.organisation

Class GameRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.organisation.GameRoom

  • public class GameRoom
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    4.0 The GameRoom organize and control the Game. It checks for Rules and decides whos turn it is
    Author:
    Alexander Posch

    • Method Detail

      • getStart

        private void getStart()
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      UnsupportedGameMode
        Init the GameBoard and the rules depending on the GameMode, when there a 2 Players in the Room. Randomly choosing a player to start.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception
        UnsupportedGameMode - Exception

      • addPlayer

        protected boolean addPlayer(Player player)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            UnsupportedGameMode
        Simply adds a Player an return a boolean, when it was sucessfull. If the second player was added, the methode getStart will be called.

      • setChessInput

        private java.lang.String setChessInput(java.lang.String information)
